projects.title: E-commerce Website
projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform with a seamless shopping experience.
projects.longDescription: This e-commerce platform features user authentication, product filtering, cart functionality, payment processing with Stripe, and a responsive design that works on all devices.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A creative portfolio website for a photographer showcasing their work.
projects.longDescription: This portfolio website includes image galleries with lightbox functionality, smooth animations, contact form, and a custom CMS for easy content updates.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker App
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile application for tracking workouts and nutrition.
projects.longDescription: This fitness tracker app allows users to log workouts, track nutrition, set goals, and view progress over time with interactive charts and statistics.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive admin dashboard for managing business operations.
projects.longDescription: This admin dashboard provides real-time analytics, user management, content moderation, and customizable reports for business owners and administrators.
